movie.title: Marie-Francine
movie.description_intro: Dumped by her husband and downsized out of her job, Marie-Francine has to move back in with her parents - at the age of 50. They treat her like a child, but she soon finds love with Miguel, a chef who doesn't admit to her that he is in the same situation. It's not easy having a young heart in a middle-age body, but Marie-Francine proves to us that 50 is the new 30.
movie.description_full: Dumped by her husband and downsized out of her job, Marie-Francine has to move back in with her parents - at the age of 50. They treat her like a child, but she soon finds love with Miguel, a chef who doesn't admit to her that he is in the same situation. It's not easy having a young heart in a middle-age body, but Marie-Francine proves to us that 50 is the new 30.

movies.title: Attack in LA
movies.summary: Three friends find themselves lost on Skid Row and are captured by an angry homeless gang.
movies.description_full: Three friends find themselves lost on Skid Row and are captured by an angry homeless gang.
movies.synopsis: Three friends find themselves lost on Skid Row and are captured by an angry homeless gang.

movies.title: The Happytime Murders
movies.summary: A murder mystery set in a world where humans and puppets co-exist, but puppets are viewed as second-class citizens. When the puppet cast of an '90s children's TV show begins to get murdered one by one, a former cop, who has since become a private eye, takes on the case.

movies.title: The Island of Dr. Moreau
movies.summary: Set in the year 2010, Dr. Moreau has successfully combined human and animal DNA to make a crossbreed animal. Well, as usual, something goes wrong and David Thewlis must try to stop it before it is too late. Originally rated R, but cut by Frankenheimer to allow "a wider audience".
movies.description_full: Set in the year 2010, Dr. Moreau has successfully combined human and animal DNA to make a crossbreed animal. Well, as usual, something goes wrong and David Thewlis must try to stop it before it is too late. Originally rated R, but cut by Frankenheimer to allow "a wider audience".

movies.title: A River Runs Through It
movies.summary: The Maclean brothers, Paul and Norman, live a relatively idyllic life in rural Montana, spending much of their time fly fishing. The sons of a minister, the boys eventually part company when Norman moves east to attend college, leaving his rebellious brother to find trouble back home. When Norman finally returns, the siblings resume their fishing outings, and assess both where they've been and where they're going.
